name: Mukunda Modell
body:
*twentyafterfour@gmail.com*

# Résumé

## Experience

***
**Senior Developer/Ops engineer at deviantART, Inc.**
*9/2011 to 1/2013*

I was responsible for maintaining and improving the infrastructure for developer productivity and collaboration. Worked with systems for automated builds continuous integration, including buildbot and cruisecontrol.rb. Developed systems for software deployment and configuration management which utilized puppet and mcollective.

***
**Senior Developer at deviantART, Inc.**
*1/2011 to 8/2011*

***
**Web Developer at deviantART, Inc.**
*1/2009 to 12/2010*

Implemented large scale user-facing web applications and enhanced existing application code written in PHP, JavaScript and CSS.

***
**Systems Software Engineer at Niveus Media**
*1/2005 to 11/2008*

Developed embedded software and operating system provisioning to support high-end consumer network-attached-storage systems.Responsible for a large portion of product development and production/deployment as well as overseeing the team of customer support engineers.

***
**Independent software engineer at D.Lux Games**
*7/2007 to 10/2008*

We developed indie social games on the Facebook platform. We utilized PHP, MySQL, HTML/JavaScript/CSS and Flash / ActionScript 3.  My role was primarily to develop the back-end systems and maintain the infrastructure, administer Linux servers, etc.

***
Recommendations available upon request

## Education

***
Missouri State University
Non-degree seeking 1998 to 2002
